Question: After his NFL career ended, this person disclosed that he had frequently experienced anxiety attacks after games.
Hints: Bill Engvall's character is affected by this person's rantings about witchcraft and voodoo in his pre-game warm-ups.
This person's successor as Woodlawn's starting quarterback was another future NFL standout, Joe Ferguson of the Buffalo Bills.
After undergoing off-season elbow surgery, this person was idle for the first 14 games of the 1983 NFL season.
